00030 #include "q4wine-cli/main.h"
00031 
00032 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00033 {
00034     QCoreApplication app(argc, argv);
00035     QTextStream Qcout(stdout);
00036     QString _PREFIX, _DIR, _ICON, _IMAGE;
00037     QString path;
00038     int _ACTION=0;
00039 
00041     typedef void *CoreLibPrototype (bool);
00042     CoreLibPrototype *CoreLibClassPointer;
00043     corelib *CoreLib;
00044 
00045     //Classes
00046     DataBase db;
00047     Prefix *db_prefix;
00048     Dir *db_dir;
00049     Icon *db_icon;
00050     Image *db_image;
00051 
00052     if (!initDb())
00053        return -1;
00054 
00055     QStringList tables;
00056     tables << "prefix" << "dir" << "icon" << "images";
00057     if (!db.checkDb(tables))
00058        return -1;
00059 
00060     // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00061     QLibrary libq4wine;
00062     libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00063 
00064     if (!libq4wine.load()){
00065         return -1;
00066     }
00067 
00068     // Getting corelib calss pointer
00069     CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00070     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(false);
00071 
00072     // Creating database classes
00073     db_dir = new Dir();
00074     db_icon = new Icon();
00075     db_image = new Image();
00076     db_prefix = new Prefix();
00077 
00078     for (int i=1; i<argc; i++){
00079         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--help") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-h")){
00080             _ACTION=-1;
00081             break;
00082         }
00083         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--version") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-v")){
00084             _ACTION=11;
00085             break;
00086         }
00087 
00088         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--procs") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-ps")){
00089             _ACTION=1;
00090         }
00091 
00092         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--prefix") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-p")){
00093             i++;
00094             if (i<argc)
00095             _PREFIX=app.arguments().at(i);
00096             if (!db_prefix->isExistsByName(_PREFIX)){
00097                 Qcout<<app.tr("Prefix named \"%1\" not exists. Run \"q4wine-cli -pl\" for prefix list.").arg(_PREFIX)<<endl;
00098                 return -1;
00099             }
00100         }
00101 
00102         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--dir") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-d")){
00103             i++;
00104             if (i<argc)
00105             _DIR=app.arguments().at(i);
00106         }
00107 
00108         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--icon") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-i")){
00109             i++;
00110             if (i<argc)
00111             _ICON=app.arguments().at(i);
00112         }
00113 
00114         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--cdimage") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-cd")){
00115             i++;
00116             if (i<argc)
00117             _IMAGE=app.arguments().at(i);
00118         }
00119 
00120         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--prefixlist") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-pl")){
00121             _ACTION=2;
00122         }
00123 
00124         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--dirlist") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-dl")){
00125             _ACTION=3;
00126         }
00127 
00128         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--iconlist") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-il")){
00129             _ACTION=4;
00130         }
00131 
00132         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--cdlist") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-cl")){
00133             _ACTION=5;
00134         }
00135 
00136         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--kill") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-k")){
00137             _ACTION=6;
00138         }
00139 
00140         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--mount") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-m")){
00141             _ACTION=7;
00142         }
00143 
00144         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--umount") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-u")){
00145             _ACTION=8;
00146         }
00147 
00148         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--cdlist") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-cl")){
00149             _ACTION=9;
00150             break;
00151         }
00152 
00153         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--mountlist") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-ml")){
00154             _ACTION=10;
00155         }
00156 
00157         if ((app.arguments().at(i)=="--binary") or (app.arguments().at(i)=="-b")){
00158             i++;
00159             if (i<argc)
00160             _IMAGE=app.arguments().at(i);
00161             path.clear();
00162             for (int j=++i; j<argc; j++){
00163                  path.append(app.arguments().at(j));
00164             }
00165             _ACTION=12;
00166         }
00167     }
00168 
00169     if ((_PREFIX.isEmpty()) && (_ICON.isEmpty()))
00170         _ACTION=-1;
00171 
00172     QList<QStringList> result;
00173     QStringList sresult;
00174 
00175     ExecObject execObj;
00176     switch (_ACTION){
00177         case 0:
00178             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00179                 Qcout<<app.tr("No current prefix set. Set prefix via \"-p <prefix_name>\" key.")<<endl;
00180                 return -1;
00181             }
00182 
00183             if (_ICON.isEmpty()){
00184                 Qcout<<app.tr("No current icon set. Set icon via \"-i <icon_name>\" key.")<<endl;
00185                 return -1;
00186             }
00187 
00188             if (!db_icon->isExistsByName(_PREFIX, _DIR, _ICON)){
00189                 Qcout<<app.tr("Icon named \"%1\" not exists.  Run \"q4wine-cli -il\" for icon list.").arg(_ICON)<<endl;
00190                 return -1;
00191             }
00192 
00193             if (CoreLib->runIcon(_PREFIX, _DIR, _ICON)){
00194                 Qcout<<"Done"<<endl;
00195             } else {
00196                 Qcout<<"Error"<<endl;
00197                 return -1;
00198             }
00199         break;
00200         case 1:
00201             result = CoreLib->getWineProcessList();
00202             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00203                 Qcout<<app.tr("Wine process list")<<endl;
00204             } else {
00205                 Qcout<<app.tr("Wine process list for \"%1\" prefix").arg(_PREFIX)<<endl;
00206                 path = db_prefix->getPath(_PREFIX);
00207             }
00208             // Preccess QList items one by one
00209             Qcout<<app.tr(" PID   Nice    Prefix path         Name:")<<endl;
00210             for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00211                 if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00212                     Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(0)<<"     "<<result.at(i).at(2)<<"    "<<result.at(i).at(3)<<"    "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<endl;
00213                 } else {
00214                     if (path==result.at(i).at(3))
00215                         Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(0)<<"     "<<result.at(i).at(2)<<"    "<<result.at(i).at(3)<<"    "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<endl;
00216                 }
00217             }
00218         break;
00219         case 2:
00220             result = db_prefix->getFields();
00221             Qcout<<app.tr("Prefix list")<<endl;
00222             Qcout<<app.tr(" Name:       Path:")<<endl;
00223             for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00224                 if (!result.at(i).at(2).isEmpty()){
00225                     Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<"       "<<result.at(i).at(2)<<endl;
00226                 } else {
00227                     Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<"   "<<QDir::homePath()<<"/.wine/"<<endl;
00228                 }
00229             }
00230         break;
00231         case 3:
00232             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00233                 Qcout<<app.tr("No current prefix set. Set prefix via \"-p <prefix_name>\" key.")<<endl;
00234                 return -1;
00235             }
00236             result = db_dir->getFieldsByPrefixName(_PREFIX);
00237             Qcout<<app.tr("Prefix \"%1\" has following dir list").arg(_PREFIX)<<endl;
00238             Qcout<<app.tr(" Name:")<<endl;
00239             for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00240                 Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<endl;
00241             }
00242         break;
00243         case 4:
00244             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00245                 Qcout<<app.tr("No current prefix set. Set prefix via \"-p <prefix_name>\" key.")<<endl;
00246                 return -1;
00247             }
00248 
00249             if (! db_dir->isExistsByName(_PREFIX, _DIR)){
00250                 Qcout<<app.tr("Dir named \"%1\" not exists. Run \"q4wine-cli -dl\" for dir list.").arg(_DIR)<<endl;
00251                 return -1;
00252             }
00253 
00254             result = db_icon->getByPrefixAndDirName(_PREFIX, _DIR);
00255             if (_DIR.isEmpty()){
00256                 Qcout<<app.tr("Prefix \"%1\" has following icon list").arg(_PREFIX)<<endl;
00257             } else {
00258                 Qcout<<app.tr("Prefix \"%1\" has following icon list at \"%2\" directory").arg(_PREFIX).arg(_DIR)<<endl;
00259             }
00260             Qcout<<app.tr(" Name:       Description:")<<endl;
00261             for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00262                 Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<"   "<<result.at(i).at(2)<<endl;
00263             }
00264         break;
00265         case 5:
00266             result = db_image->getFields();
00267             Qcout<<app.tr("q4wine has following CD images at database")<<endl;
00268             Qcout<<app.tr(" Name:                   Path:")<<endl;
00269             for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00270                 Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(0)<<"           "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<endl;
00271             }
00272         break;
00273         case 6:
00274             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00275                 Qcout<<app.tr("No current prefix set. Set prefix via \"-p <prefix_name>\" key.")<<endl;
00276                 return -1;
00277             }
00278             result = db_dir->getFieldsByPrefixName(_PREFIX);
00279             Qcout<<app.tr("Killing prefix \"%1\" wineserver.").arg(_PREFIX)<<endl;
00280             if (CoreLib->killWineServer(db_prefix->getPath(_PREFIX))){
00281                 Qcout<<"Done"<<endl;
00282             } else {
00283                 Qcout<<"Error"<<endl;
00284                 return -1;
00285             }
00286         break;
00287         case 7:
00288             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00289                 Qcout<<app.tr("No current prefix set. Set prefix via \"-p <prefix_name>\" key.")<<endl;
00290                 return -1;
00291             }
00292             sresult = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(_PREFIX);
00293 
00294             if (sresult.at(6).isEmpty()){
00295                 Qcout<<app.tr("No mount point set in prefix configuration.")<<endl;
00296                 return -1;
00297             }
00298 
00299             if (_IMAGE.isEmpty()){
00300                 if (sresult.at(7).isEmpty()){
00301                     Qcout<<app.tr("No cdrom drive set in prefix configuration.")<<endl;
00302                     return -1;
00303                 }
00304                 Qcout<<app.tr("Mounting drive \"%1\" into mount point \"%2\".").arg(sresult.at(7)).arg(sresult.at(6))<<endl;
00305                 if (CoreLib->mountImage(sresult.at(7), _PREFIX)){
00306                     Qcout<<"Done"<<endl;
00307                 } else {
00308                     Qcout<<"Error"<<endl;
00309                     return -1;
00310                 }
00311             } else {
00312                 if (!QFile(_IMAGE).exists()){
00313                     if (!db_image->isExistsByName(_IMAGE)){
00314                         Qcout<<app.tr("No CD iamge \"%1\" exists. Run \"q4wine-cli -cl\" for CD image list.").arg(_IMAGE)<<endl;
00315                         return -1;
00316                     }
00317                 }
00318 
00319                 if (CoreLib->mountImage(_IMAGE, _PREFIX)){
00320                     Qcout<<"Done"<<endl;
00321                 } else {
00322                     Qcout<<"Error"<<endl;
00323                     return -1;
00324                 }
00325             }
00326         break;
00327         case 8:
00328             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00329                 Qcout<<app.tr("No current prefix set. Set prefix via \"-p <prefix_name>\" key.")<<endl;
00330                 return -1;
00331             }
00332             sresult = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(_PREFIX);
00333 
00334             if (sresult.at(6).isEmpty()){
00335                 Qcout<<app.tr("No mount point set in prefix configuration.")<<endl;
00336                 return -1;
00337             }
00338 
00339             Qcout<<app.tr("Un mounting mount point \"%1\".").arg(sresult.at(6))<<endl;
00340             if (CoreLib->umountImage(_PREFIX)){
00341                 Qcout<<"Done"<<endl;
00342             } else {
00343                 Qcout<<"Error"<<endl;
00344                 return -1;
00345             }
00346         break;
00347         case 9:
00348             result = db_image->getFields();
00349             Qcout<<app.tr("Image list")<<endl;
00350             Qcout<<app.tr(" Name:       Path:")<<endl;
00351             for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00352                 Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(0)<<"       "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<endl;
00353             }
00354         break;
00355         case 10:
00356             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00357                 result = db_prefix->getFields();
00358                 Qcout<<app.tr("Mounted media list for all prefixes")<<endl;
00359                 Qcout<<app.tr(" Prefix:   Mount point:      Media:")<<endl;
00360                 for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); ++i) {
00361                         Qcout<<" "<<result.at(i).at(1)<<"     "<<result.at(i).at(7)<<"      "<<CoreLib->getMountedImages(result.at(i).at(7))<<endl;
00362                 }
00363             } else {
00364                 sresult = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(_PREFIX);
00365 
00366                 if (sresult.at(6).isEmpty()){
00367                 Qcout<<app.tr("No mount point set in prefix configuration.")<<endl;
00368                 return -1;
00369                 }
00370 
00371                 Qcout<<app.tr("Mounted media list for prefix \"%1\"").arg(_PREFIX)<<endl;
00372                 Qcout<<app.tr(" Mount point:        Media:")<<endl;
00373                 Qcout<<" "<<sresult.at(6)<<"      "<<CoreLib->getMountedImages(sresult.at(6))<<endl;
00374 
00375             }
00376         break;
00377         case 11:
00378             Qcout<<app.tr("q4wine-cli %1").arg(APP_VERS)<<endl;
00379             Qcout<<app.tr("(Copyright (C) 2008-2009, brezblock core team.")<<endl;
00380             Qcout<<app.tr("License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later <http://gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html>.")<<endl;
00381             Qcout<<app.tr("This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it.")<<endl;
00382             Qcout<<app.tr("There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.")<<endl;
00383             Qcout<<endl;
00384             Qcout<<app.tr("Author: Malakhov Alexey aka John Brezerk.")<<endl;
00385         break;
00386         case 12:
00387             if (_PREFIX.isEmpty()){
00388                 Qcout<<app.tr("No current prefix set. Set prefix via \"-p <prefix_name>\" key.")<<endl;
00389                 return -1;
00390             }
00391 
00392             qDebug()<<_IMAGE;
00393 
00394             if (!QFile(_IMAGE).exists()){
00395                 Qcout<<app.tr("File \"%1\" not exists.").arg(_IMAGE)<<endl;
00396                 return -1;
00397             }
00398 
00399             sresult = _IMAGE.split("/");
00400             execObj.wrkdir = _IMAGE.left(_IMAGE.length() - sresult.last().length());
00401             execObj.override = "";
00402             execObj.winedebug = "";
00403             execObj.useconsole = "";
00404             execObj.display = "";
00405             execObj.cmdargs = path;
00406             execObj.cmdargs = "";
00407             execObj.desktop = "";
00408             execObj.prefixid = db_prefix->getId(_PREFIX);
00409             execObj.execcmd=_IMAGE;
00410             if (CoreLib->runWineBinary(execObj)){
00411                 Qcout<<"Done"<<endl;
00412             } else {
00413                 Qcout<<"Error"<<endl;
00414                 return -1;
00415             }
00416         break;
00417         default:
00418             Qcout<<app.tr("Usage:")<<endl;
00419             Qcout<<app.tr("  q4wine-cli [KEY]...")<<endl;
00420             Qcout<<app.tr("  q4wine-cli -p <prefix_name> [-d <dir_name>] -i <icon_name>")<<endl;
00421             Qcout<<app.tr("  q4wine-cli -p <prefix_name> -b <windows_binary_path> [args]")<<endl;
00422             Qcout<<app.tr("Console utility for wine applications and prefixes management.")<<endl<<endl;
00423             Qcout<<app.tr("KEYs list:")<<endl;
00424             Qcout<<app.tr("  -h,  --help          display this help and exit")<<endl;
00425             Qcout<<app.tr("  -v,  --version   output version information and exit")<<endl;
00426             Qcout<<app.tr("  -ps, --procs         output wine process list for current prefix or for all prefixes and exit ")<<endl;
00427             Qcout<<app.tr("  -p,  --prefix        sets the current prefix name")<<endl;
00428             Qcout<<app.tr("  -d,  --dir       sets the current direcory name")<<endl;
00429             Qcout<<app.tr("  -i,  --icon          sets the current icon name")<<endl;
00430             Qcout<<app.tr("  -cd, --cdimage   sets the cd iamge name")<<endl;
00431             Qcout<<app.tr("  -b, --binary     sets the path to windows binary for execute with current prefix settings.")<<endl;
00432             Qcout<<app.tr("  -k,  --kill          sends -9 term signal to current prefix precess or for all prefixes processes")<<endl;
00433             Qcout<<app.tr("  -pl, --prefixlist    output all exesting prefixes names and exit")<<endl;
00434             Qcout<<app.tr("  -dl, --dirlist   output all exesting dir names for current prefix and exit")<<endl;
00435             Qcout<<app.tr("  -il, --iconlist      output all exesting icon names for current prefix/directory and exit")<<endl;
00436             Qcout<<app.tr("  -cl, --cdlist        output all cd images list and exit")<<endl;
00437             Qcout<<app.tr("  -ml, --mountlist     output all mounted media for current prefix or all prefixes and exit")<<endl;
00438             Qcout<<app.tr("  -m,  --mount         mount an cd iamage or drive for current prefix and exit")<<endl;
00439             Qcout<<app.tr("  -u,  --umount        umount an cd iamage or drive for current prefix and exit")<<endl;
00440             Qcout<<endl;
00441             Qcout<<app.tr("Exit status:")<<endl;
00442             Qcout<<app.tr("  0 if OK,")<<endl;
00443             Qcout<<app.tr("  -1 if serious troubles")<<endl;
00444             Qcout<<endl;
00445             Qcout<<app.tr("Report q4wine bugs to brezerk@gmail.com")<<endl;
00446             Qcout<<app.tr("q4wine homepage: <http://sourceforge.net/projects/q4wine/>")<<endl;
00447             Qcout<<app.tr("General help using GNU software: <http://www.gnu.org/gethelp/>")<<endl;
00448         break;
00449     }
00450 
00451     db.close();
00452     return 0;
